channel.title: Monsters don't die?
channel.description: I'm on a 562 insidia source and some of the bigger monsters (KBD, sea troll queen, frost dragons, maybe some others) don't die on occasion. You red bar them once, then they go to max health and don't drop. Any suggestions? I've had this bug for a while and really don't know the cause. Thanks!

item.title: Monsters don't die?
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

I’ve seen this on older servers basicly the npc’s have tooo much hitpoints, try finding a npc.java file and seeing if you can find their hitpoints stated some where.

Read full topic
